{{ _('

"Virtue, Erudition, Creativity, and Pragmatism" are the principles of the school.

RDFZ aims to cultivate students not only with a solid well-rounded development, but also with special skills, innovation, and morality.

The International Curriculum Center (ICC) was founded in 2004 with the goal of educating those Chinese students who wish to receive a university education abroad.

The mission statement of the school is "respect individuality, discover and promote each student's potential, and help them develop into solid citizens anxious to further the prosperity of our country and the advancement of humanity".
